summary: Wanna create new or modified people in Skyrim? Like to have that weight slider finally not glitch up when you alter your figure\'s weight?? Pine no more! This guide will help you achieve these goals and it\'s all step by step, baby.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first share posting here at Nexus. I have been asking around lately on how to modify figure meshes, but have had some real shit luck with it. That is why I decided to bite the bullet & sell my soul to Chuck Norris. After seven hours of rigorous prostrating, my new master finally granted me knowledge needed to accomplish my goals. What a bargain, hey?

While my tutorial utilizes steps involved in our buddy Vannus\' guide to getting meshes into Skyrim, it ALSO mentions one important aspect which I believe only Master Norris knew until now. To get the weight slider working: After doing the known steps, you must \"Remove Duplicate Vertices\" and reconstitute your skin partition!! AHHHH! It\'s so simple. Boy, I wish I had my filthy soul back. Oh well. I have some cool Skyrim bods at least! 

Good luck and happy mesh modding, everyone! 

So provideth the Pizza Monster...

PS: Heres a link to the PDF in case something happens to the servers here at Nexus:
http://troy2.magix.net/SkyrimMeshModdersguide101.pdf
author: The Pizza Monster
